column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jennifer - Thank you for the excellent review. I'm glad you were able to give us a try
column2: and even more glad that you enjoyed our fare. For the sake of clarity
column3: our Cha Cha Cha Ramen contains fish powder
column4: which we add to the broth. Otherwise
column5: thank you again for the kind words
column6: and we hope to serve you again soon!
